operations.notes:
Show measurements of all types

This resource holds a list of measurements of all different measurement types (dns, http, etc.).

It allows for sorting and filtering based on properties of the measurements.

Note that the returned list is polymorphic, so that the fields returned will differ per measurement type.
operations.summary: Show measurements of all types

parameters.name: bill_to
parameters.description: The cost of this measurement is deducted from the user in this field. The default is the creator of the measurement

parameters.name: is_oneoff
parameters.description: Flag indicating that all measurements in the `definitions` object should be one-off measurements

parameters.name: start_time
parameters.description: Configured start time for all measurements in the `definitions` section as either an unix timestamp or as a ISO-8601/ECMA-262 javascript datetime.

parameters.name: stop_time
parameters.description: Configured stop time for all measurements in the `definitions` section as either an unix timestamp or as a ISO-8601/ECMA-262 javascript datetime.

parameters.name: skip_dns_check
parameters.description: Flag disabling the target DNS check on measurement creation. Only probes will do that.

parameters.name: definitions
parameters.description: Array of measurement definitions. Each measurement definition is a JSON object.

parameters.name: probes
parameters.description: Properties of requested probes.

operations.notes:
API endpoint to stop a running measurement.

Sending a DELETE http verb to the API will stop the measurement. You can only stop measurements that belong to the current logged in user, or by passing in a key query parameter with a key that has permissions to stop a measurement.
operations.summary: API endpoint to stop a running measurement

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sort measurement groups by ID, ascending or descending (with - prefixed)

parameters.name: has_multiple_members
parameters.description: Return only measurement groups that contain more than one member measurement.

operations.notes: Resource describing the result set of a measurement.
operations.summary: Resource describing the result set of a measurement

apis.description: Resource describing the result set of a measurement

af.description: [Not for wifi] IPv4 of IPv6 Address family of the measurement

creation_time.description: The creation date and time of the measurement (Defaults to unix timestamp format)

group.description: URL of the group master measurement

group_id.description: The ID of the measurement group. This ID references a measurement acting as group master

in_wifi_group.description: Flag indicating this measurement belongs to a wifi measurement group

interval.description: Interval between samples. The default varies per measurement type

is_all_scheduled.description: Returns true if all probe requests have made it through the scheduling process.

is_oneoff.description: Flag indicating this is a one-off measurement

is_public.description: Flag indicating this measurement is a publicly available

port.description: The target port number. Defaults to 443

probes_requested.description: Number of probes requested, but not necessarily granted to this measurement

probes_scheduled.description: Number of probes actually scheduled for this measurement

resolve_on_probe.description: Flag that, when set to true, indicates that a name should be resolved (using DNS) on the probe. Otherwise it will be resolved on the RIPE Atlas servers

resolved_ips.description: The list of IP addresses returned for the fqdn in the `target` field by the backend infra-structure resolvers

result.description: The URL that contains the results of this measurement

spread.description: The Spread of uniformly distributed random probe start time phase

start_time.description: Configured start time (as a unix timestamp)

status.description: Returns a JSON object containing `id` and `name` (0: Specified, 1: Scheduled, 2: Ongoing, 4: Stopped, 5: Forced to stop, 6: No suitable probes, 7: Failed, 8: Archived)

stop_time.description: Actual end time of measurement (as a unix timestamp)

target.description: The FQDN (if it was requested) or the ip address of the target of this measurement

target_asn.description: The ASN the IP the target is in

target_ip.description: The IP Address of the target of the measurement

type.description: Returns the type of the measurement

af.description: [Not for wifi] IPv4 of IPv6 Address family of the measurement

anonymous_identity.description: [wifi only] Username used for outer connection. If omitted the `identity` field is used for the outer connection

destination_option_size.description: [traceroute only] Size of an IPv6 destination option header filled with NOPs

dont_fragment.description: [traceroute type only] Do not fragment outgoing packets

duplicate_timeout.description: [traceroute type only] Time to wait (in milliseconds) for a duplicate response after receiving the first response

eap.description: [wifi only] Extensible Authentication Protocol type. Currently only `TTLS` is available

extended_timing.description: [http only] Enable time-to-resolve, time-to-connect and time-to-first-byte measurements

extra_wait.description: Wait this amount of time before executing measurement commands.

first_hop.description: [traceroute type only] TTL (time to live) of the first hop in traceroute measurement

group.description: URL of the group master measurement

group_id.description: The ID of the measurement group. This ID references a measurement acting as group master

header_bytes.description: [http type only] Maximum number of bytes in the reponse header, defaults to 0

hop_by_hop_option_size.description: [traceroute only] Size of an IPv6 hop-by-hop option header filled with NOPs

identity.description: [wifi only] Username used for wifi connection. Used for both outer and inner connection if anonymous_identity is omitted

in_wifi_group.description: Flag indicating this measurement belongs to a wifi measurement group

include_abuf.description: [dns only] include the raw DNS answer data in the result. Defaults to true

include_qbuf.description: [dns only] include the raw DNS query data in the result. Defaults to false

interval.description: Interval between samples. The default varies per measurement type

ipv4.description: [wifi only] Flag indicating IPv4 measurements are attempted in this group

ipv6.description: [wifi only] Flag indicating IPv6 measurements are attempted in this group

is_oneoff.description: Flag indicating this is a one-off measurement

is_public.description: Flag indicating this measurement is a publicly available

key_mgmt.description: [wifi only] Authentication mechanism used for the wifi connection. For WPA-PSK `psk` field is also required,for WPA-EAP `eap` and `password` fields are required

max_hops.description: [traceroute type only] Traceroute measurement stops after the hop at which the TTL reaches this value

method.description: [http type only] http verb of the measurement request

more_extended_timing.description: [http only] Include fields added by extended_timing and adds readtiming which reports for each read system call when it happened and how much data was delivered

packet_interval.description: [ping only] Time between packets in milliseconds. Value must be between 2 and 300000

packets.description: [ping,traceroute,ntp type only] The number of packets send in a measurement execution. Value must be between 1 and 16. Default is 3

paris.description: [traceroute type only] The number of paris traceroute variations to try. Zero disables paris traceroute. Value must be between 0 and 64

path.description: [http type only] Path of the requested URL

phase2.description: [wifi only] Connection and Authentication directives for the inner connection. Only used for WPA-EAP. Currently only EAP-MSCHAPv2 is available

port.description: [sslcert,traceroute type only] The target port number (TCP only for traceroute). Defaults to 80 for traceroute and 443 for sslcert

prepend_probe_id.description: [dns only] Each probe prepends its probe number to the query_argument to make it unique

protocol.description: [traceroute, dns type only] Protocol used in measurement

query_argument.description: [dns type only] The `argument` part of the query used in the measurement

query_class.description: [dns type only] The `class` part of the query used in the measurement

query_string.description: [http type only] Optional query parameters of the requested URL

query_type.description: [dns type only] The `type` part of the query used in the measurement

resolve_on_probe.description: Flag that, when set to true, indicates that a name should be resolved (using DNS) on the probe. Otherwise it will be resolved on the RIPE Atlas servers

response_timeout.description: [traceroute type only] Response timeout for one packet

retry.description: [dns only] Number of times to retry

rssi.description: [wifi only] Flag indicating that BSSID radio signal strength will be measured and stored

set_cd_bit.description: [dns only] Flag indicating DNSSEC Checking Disabled (RFC4035) was set

set_do_bit.description: [dns only] Flag indicating DNSSEC OK (RFC3225) was set

set_nsid_bit.description: [dns only] Flag indicating Name Server Identifier (RFC5001) was set

set_rd_bit.description: [dns type only] Flag indicating Recursion Desired bit was set

size.description: [ping,traceroute type only] size of the data part of the packet, i.e. excluding any IP and ICMP headers. Value must be between 1 and 2048

spread.description: The Spread of uniformly distributed random probe start time phase

ssid.description: [wifi only] Wifi SSID to connect to. Max. 32 characters

target.description: The FQDN (if it was requested) or the ip address of the target of this measurement

timeout.description: [ntp type only] Per packet timeout in milliseconds

type.description: Returns the type of the measurement

udp_payload_size.description: [dns type only] Set the DNS0 option for UDP payload size to this value, between 512 and 4096.Defaults to 512)

use_probe_resolver.description: [dns type only] Send the DNS query to the probe's local resolvers (instead of an explicitly specified target)

user_agent.description: [http type only] user agent header field sent in the http request. Defaults to 'RIPE Atlas: https//atlas.ripe.net'

version.description: [http type only] http version of measurement request

anonymous_identity.description: [wifi only] Username used for outer connection. If omitted the `identity` field is used for the outer connection

bill_to.description: The cost of this measurement is deducted from the credits of the user in this field. The default is the creator of the measurement

eap.description: [wifi only] Extensible Authentication Protocol type. Currently only `TTLS` is available

extra_wait.description: Wait this amount of time before executing measurement commands.

group_id.description: The ID of the measurement group. This ID references a measurement acting as group master

identity.description: [wifi only] Username used for wifi connection. Used for both outer and inner connection if anonymous_identity is omitted

in_wifi_group.description: Flag indicating this measurement belongs to a wifi measurement group

interval.description: Interval between samples. The default varies per measurement type

ipv4.description: [wifi only] Flag indicating IPv4 measurements are attempted in this group

ipv6.description: [wifi only] Flag indicating IPv6 measurements are attempted in this group

is_all_scheduled.description: Returns true if all probe requests have made it through the scheduling process.

is_oneoff.description: Flag indicating this is a one-off measurement

is_public.description: Flag indicating this measurement is a publicly available

key_mgmt.description: [wifi only] Authentication mechanism used for the wifi connection. For WPA-PSK `psk` field is also required,for WPA-EAP `eap` and `password` fields are required

password.description: [wifi only] Password on the inner connection if WPA-EAP is used

phase2.description: [wifi only] Connection and Authentication directives for the inner connection. Only used for WPA-EAP. Currently only EAP-MSCHAPv2 is available

probes_requested.description: Number of probes requested, but not necessarily granted to this measurement

probes_scheduled.description: Number of probes actually scheduled for this measurement

psk.description: [wifi only] Pre-shared Key (passphrase) used for wifi connection with WPA-PSK

resolve_on_probe.description: Flag that, when set to true, indicates that a name should be resolved (using DNS) on the probe. Otherwise it will be resolved on the RIPE Atlas servers

rssi.description: [wifi only] Flag indicating that BSSID radio signal strength will be measured and stored

spread.description: The Spread of uniformly distributed random probe start time phase

ssid.description: [wifi only] Wifi SSID to connect to. Max. 32 characters

start_time.description: Configured start time (as a unix timestamp)

stop_time.description: Actual end time of measurement (as a unix timestamp)

target.description: The FQDN (if it was requested) or the ip address of the target of this measurement

target_asn.description: The ASN the IP the target is in

target_ip.description: The IP Address of the target of the measurement

type.description: Returns the type of the measurement

requested.description: Maximum number of probes to be used in this measurement

type.description: Probe selector. Options are: `area` allows a compass quarter of the world, `asn` selects an Autonomous System, `country` selects a country, `msm` selects the probes used in another measurement, `prefix` selects probes based on prefix, `probes` selects probes directly

value.description: Value for given selector type. `area`: ['WW','West','North-Central','South-Central','North-East','South-East']. `asn`: ASN (integer). `country`: two-letter country code according to ISO 3166-1 alpha-2, e.g. GR. `msm`: measurement id (integer). `prefix`: prefix in CIDR notation, e.g. 193.0.0/16. `probes`: comma-separated list of probe IDs

packets.description: [ping,traceroute,ntp type only] Number of NTP requests to send per measurement

probes_requested.description: Number of probes requested, but not necessarily granted to this measurement

probes_scheduled.description: Number of probes actually scheduled for this measurement

resolve_on_probe.description: Flag that, when set to true, indicates that a name should be resolved (using DNS) on the probe. Otherwise it will be resolved on the RIPE Atlas servers

spread.description: The Spread of uniformly distributed random probe start time phase

start_time.description: Configured start time (as a unix timestamp)

stop_time.description: Actual end time of measurement (as a unix timestamp)

target.description: The FQDN (if it was requested) or the ip address of the target of this measurement

target_asn.description: The ASN the IP the target is in

target_ip.description: The IP Address of the target of the measurement

timeout.description: [ntp type only] Per packet timeout in milliseconds

type.description: Returns the type of the measurement

af.description: [Not for wifi] IPv4 of IPv6 Address family of the measurement

bill_to.description: The cost of this measurement is deducted from the credits of the user in this field. The default is the creator of the measurement

group_id.description: The ID of the measurement group. This ID references a measurement acting as group master

in_wifi_group.description: Flag indicating this measurement belongs to a wifi measurement group

interval.description: Interval between samples. The default varies per measurement type

is_all_scheduled.description: Returns true if all probe requests have made it through the scheduling process.

is_public.description: Flag indicating this measurement is a publicly available

packet_interval.description: [ping only] Time between packets in milliseconds. Value must be between 2 and 300000

packets.description: [ping,traceroute,ntp type only] The number of packets send in a measurement execution. Value must be between 1 and 16. Default is 3

probes_requested.description: Number of probes requested, but not necessarily granted to this measurement

probes_scheduled.description: Number of probes actually scheduled for this measurement

resolve_on_probe.description: Flag that, when set to true, indicates that a name should be resolved (using DNS) on the probe. Otherwise it will be resolved on the RIPE Atlas servers

size.description: [ping,traceroute type only] size of the data part of the packet, i.e. excluding any IP and ICMP headers. Value must be between 1 and 2048

spread.description: The Spread of uniformly distributed random probe start time phase

start_time.description: Configured start time (as a unix timestamp)

stop_time.description: Actual end time of measurement (as a unix timestamp)

target.description: The FQDN (if it was requested) or the ip address of the target of this measurement

target_asn.description: The ASN the IP the target is in

target_ip.description: The IP Address of the target of the measurement

type.description: Returns the type of the measurement

af.description: [Not for wifi] IPv4 of IPv6 Address family of the measurement

anonymous_identity.description: [wifi only] Username used for outer connection. If omitted the `identity` field is used for the outer connection

bill_to.description: The cost of this measurement is deducted from the credits of the user in this field. The default is the creator of the measurement

destination_option_size.description: [traceroute only] Size of an IPv6 destination option header filled with NOPs

dont_fragment.description: [traceroute type only] Do not fragment outgoing packets

duplicate_timeout.description: [traceroute type only] Time to wait (in milliseconds) for a duplicate response after receiving the first response

eap.description: [wifi only] Extensible Authentication Protocol type. Currently only `TTLS` is available

extended_timing.description: [http only] Enable time-to-resolve, time-to-connect and time-to-first-byte measurements

extra_wait.description: Wait this amount of time before executing measurement commands.

first_hop.description: [traceroute type only] TTL (time to live) of the first hop in traceroute measurement

group_id.description: The ID of the measurement group. This ID references a measurement acting as group master

header_bytes.description: [http type only] Maximum number of bytes in the reponse header, defaults to 0

hop_by_hop_option_size.description: [traceroute only] Size of an IPv6 hop-by-hop option header filled with NOPs

identity.description: [wifi only] Username used for wifi connection. Used for both outer and inner connection if anonymous_identity is omitted

in_wifi_group.description: Flag indicating this measurement belongs to a wifi measurement group

include_abuf.description: [dns only] include the raw DNS answer data in the result. Defaults to true

include_qbuf.description: [dns only] include the raw DNS query data in the result. Defaults to false

interval.description: Interval between samples. The default varies per measurement type

ipv4.description: [wifi only] Flag indicating IPv4 measurements are attempted in this group

ipv6.description: [wifi only] Flag indicating IPv6 measurements are attempted in this group

is_all_scheduled.description: Returns true if all probe requests have made it through the scheduling process.

is_oneoff.description: Flag indicating this is a one-off measurement

is_public.description: Flag indicating this measurement is a publicly available

key_mgmt.description: [wifi only] Authentication mechanism used for the wifi connection. For WPA-PSK `psk` field is also required,for WPA-EAP `eap` and `password` fields are required

max_hops.description: [traceroute type only] Traceroute measurement stops after the hop at which the TTL reaches this value

method.description: [http type only] http verb of the measurement request

more_extended_timing.description: [http only] Include fields added by extended_timing and adds readtiming which reports for each read system call when it happened and how much data was delivered

packet_interval.description: [ping only] Time between packets in milliseconds. Value must be between 2 and 300000

packets.description: [ping,traceroute,ntp type only] The number of packets send in a measurement execution. Value must be between 1 and 16. Default is 3

paris.description: [traceroute type only] The number of paris traceroute variations to try. Zero disables paris traceroute. Value must be between 0 and 64

password.description: [wifi only] Password on the inner connection if WPA-EAP is used

path.description: [http type only] Path of the requested URL

phase2.description: [wifi only] Connection and Authentication directives for the inner connection. Only used for WPA-EAP. Currently only EAP-MSCHAPv2 is available

port.description: [sslcert,traceroute type only] The target port number (TCP only for traceroute). Defaults to 80 for traceroute and 443 for sslcert

prepend_probe_id.description: [dns only] Each probe prepends its probe number to the query_argument to make it unique

probes_requested.description: Number of probes requested, but not necessarily granted to this measurement

probes_scheduled.description: Number of probes actually scheduled for this measurement

protocol.description: [traceroute, dns type only] Protocol used in measurement

psk.description: [wifi only] Pre-shared Key (passphrase) used for wifi connection with WPA-PSK

query_argument.description: [dns type only] The `argument` part of the query used in the measurement

query_class.description: [dns type only] The `class` part of the query used in the measurement

query_string.description: [http type only] Optional query parameters of the requested URL

query_type.description: [dns type only] The `type` part of the query used in the measurement

resolve_on_probe.description: Flag that, when set to true, indicates that a name should be resolved (using DNS) on the probe. Otherwise it will be resolved on the RIPE Atlas servers

response_timeout.description: [traceroute type only] Response timeout for one packet

retry.description: [dns only] Number of times to retry

rssi.description: [wifi only] Flag indicating that BSSID radio signal strength will be measured and stored

set_cd_bit.description: [dns only] Flag indicating DNSSEC Checking Disabled (RFC4035) was set

set_do_bit.description: [dns only] Flag indicating DNSSEC OK (RFC3225) was set

set_nsid_bit.description: [dns only] Flag indicating Name Server Identifier (RFC5001) was set

set_rd_bit.description: [dns type only] Flag indicating Recursion Desired bit was set

size.description: [ping,traceroute type only] size of the data part of the packet, i.e. excluding any IP and ICMP headers. Value must be between 1 and 2048

spread.description: The Spread of uniformly distributed random probe start time phase

ssid.description: [wifi only] Wifi SSID to connect to. Max. 32 characters

start_time.description: Configured start time (as a unix timestamp)

stop_time.description: Actual end time of measurement (as a unix timestamp)

target.description: The FQDN (if it was requested) or the ip address of the target of this measurement

target_asn.description: The ASN the IP the target is in

target_ip.description: The IP Address of the target of the measurement

timeout.description: [ntp type only] Per packet timeout in milliseconds

type.description: Returns the type of the measurement

udp_payload_size.description: [dns type only] Set the DNS0 option for UDP payload size to this value, between 512 and 4096.Defaults to 512)

use_probe_resolver.description: [dns type only] Send the DNS query to the probe's local resolvers (instead of an explicitly specified target)

user_agent.description: [http type only] user agent header field sent in the http request. Defaults to 'RIPE Atlas: https//atlas.ripe.net'

version.description: [http type only] http version of measurement request
